mapper.select: SELECT MMAR.PLNT_CD , MMAR.MITM_REQ_IDX , MMAR.RST_SEQ , MMAR.RST_PROC_CD , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = MMAR.RST_PROC_CD) AS RST_PROC_NM , MMAR.ISP_DUR_TM , MMAR.EQM_USE_TM , MMAR.ANS_EQM_CD , MMAR.AMITM_CD , (SELECT VRIA_KN FROM MS_AMITM MA WHERE MA.AMITM_CD = MMAR.AMITM_CD) AS VRIA_KN , (SELECT VRIA_NO FROM MS_AMITM MA WHERE MA.AMITM_CD = MMAR.AMITM_CD) AS VRIA_NO , (SELECT AITM_KN FROM MS_AITM WHERE AITM_CD = (SELECT AITM_CD FROM MS_AMITM MA WHERE MA.AMITM_CD = MMAR.AMITM_CD)) AS AITM_KN , MMAR.SMP_CLLT_QTY , MMAR.SMP_CLLT_UNIT , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = MMAR.SMP_CLLT_UNIT) AS SMP_CLLT_UNIT_NM , MMAR.SMP_CLLT_DT , MMAR.CLLT_TM_STR , MMAR.CLLT_TM_END , MMAR.RST_JDG , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = MMAR.RST_JDG) AS RST_JDG_NM , MMAR.RST_RMK , MMAR.ANS_EQM_CD , MMAR.PERSPEC_TXT , MMAR.OWC_SPEC_TXT , MMAR.SPEC_TXT_EN , MMAR.PER_SLV_LOW , MMAR.PER_SLV_UPP , MMAR.PER_SLV_DESC , MMAR.OWC_SLV_LOW , MMAR.OWC_SLV_UPP , MMAR.OWC_SLV_DESC , MMAR.RST_DPNT , MMAR.RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL , MMAR.RPT_PRT_ITM_NM , MMAR.RST_VAL , MMAR.MARK_VAL , MMAR.ANS_RST_INP_DS , MMAR.RPT_PRT_YN , (SELECT DPT_NM FROM SY_DPT SD WHERE SD.DPT_CD = MMAR.ANS_DPT_CD AND SD.PLNT_CD = MMAR.PLNT_CD) AS ANS_DPT_NM , MMAR.SPEC_TYP , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = MMAR.SPEC_TYP) AS SPEC_TYP_NM , MMAR.JDG_TYP , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = MMAR.JDG_TYP) AS JDG_TYP_NM , MMAR.SLV_JDG_CFM , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = MMAR.SLV_JDG_CFM AND SCD.PLNT_CD = MMAR.PLNT_CD) AS SLV_JDG_CFM_NM , MMAR.SLV_JDG_NON_CFM , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = MMAR.SLV_JDG_NON_CFM AND SCD.PLNT_CD = MMAR.PLNT_CD) AS SLV_JDG_NON_CFM_NM , MMAR.RST_UNIT_CD , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = MMAR.RST_UNIT_CD AND SCD.PLNT_CD = MMAR.PLNT_CD) AS RST_UNIT_NM FROM MT_MITM_ANS_RST MMAR WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND MMAR.MITM_REQ_IDX = #{mitmReqIdx} AND MMAR.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY MMAR.AITM_ORD
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MT_MITM_ANS_RST WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND MITM_REQ_IDX = #{mitmReqIdx} AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND RST_JDG IS NULL
SELECT DECODE(COUNT(*), 0, 'S0110001', 'S0110002') AS SYT_JDG FROM MT_MITM_ANS_RST WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND MITM_REQ_IDX = #{mitmReqIdx} AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND RST_JDG = 'S0120002'
